lang.directions: Click on a red hotspot in the schematic or on an item in the Equipment menu to see corresponding lubricant information. To view more of the schematic, click and drag with your mouse or use the arrow keys on your keyboard.
lang.touchModeQuestion: It appears you’re using a touch-enabled device. Would you prefer to use the touch-optimized interface?

products.name: Mobil Pegasus™ 605, Mobil Pegasus™ 610
products.information: Gas engine oil for bio-gas-fueled engines
products.benefits: Excellent deposit control and siloxane handling ability; helps extend oil and engine component life and increase equipment reliability

products.name: Mobilith SHC™ 100
products.information: Synthetic greases for lubrication of bearings
products.benefits: Excellent wear protection of components; easy start-up at low temperature; helps extend re-greasing interval - helps reduce service cost

products.name: Mobil DTE™ Oil Named
products.information: Premium performance circulating lubricants where long lubricant service life is required
products.benefits: The highly versatile performance of Mobil DTE Oil Named oils has made them the oil of choice for a multitude of industrial equipment applications around the world.

products.name: Mobil Polyrex™ EM
products.benefits: Advanced thickener formulation for improved bearing performance and protection for long electric motor life; excellent corrosion resistance; low-noise properties

subcomponents.name: Oil-Flooded Rotary Screw or Reciprocating Compressor

products.name: Mobil Glygoyle™ 68 or Mobil Glygoyle™ 100
products.information: Synthetic gear, bearing and compressor oil
products.benefits: Designed to provide long oil life and equipment protection; low traction coefficient helps maximize energy efficiency.

products.information: Synthetic greases for lubrication of bearings

products.name: Mobil SHC™ 600
products.information: Synthetic gear, bearing and circulating oils
products.benefits: Helps improve equipment productivity due to reduced unscheduled downtime and maintenance; long gear and bearing life under high-stress operating conditions; helps extend oil life; helps improve energy efficiency compared with mineral oils

products.name: Mobil DTE™ 10M, Mobil DTE™ 20
products.information: Premium performance anti-wear hydraulic oils engineered for wide temperature range applications
products.benefits: Helps keep hydraulic systems clean preventing valve sticking; controls contamination and provides wear protection to help improve equipment reliability and life compared to ExxonMobil's standard hydraulic fluids, which can reduce both maintenance costs and product disposal costs; shear stability-enabling oil to maintain system efficiency and equipment protection at both high and low temperatures
